product_name: Sawyer Stay-Put System 2 Sunscreen SPF 50 - 8 fl. oz.
long_description: Sawyer Stay-Put(R) System 2 SPF 50 sunscreen provides 2 layers of protection to ensure you won't get burned during a long day outdoors. 2-layer system features 1 layer that penetrates into the skin and another layer that bonds close to the skin's surface. Even if the top layer is wiped off, the underlying layer continues to protect against the sun's harmful solar rays. Stay-Put System 2 sunscreen works well even when applied to moist skin. Because of its effective 2-layer protection, the Sawyer Stay-Put System 2 formula may feel slightly greasy to the skin when applied.
short_description: Sawyer Stay-Put(R) System 2 SPF 50 sunscreen provides 2 layers of protection to ensure you won't get burned during a long day outdoors.
